name: Gamble Tower
description:
With each step, you'll face choices that can lead to untold riches or dire consequences. Will you risk it all to rise above?




Turn the odds in your favor by capturing defeated enemies and adding them to your deck. Harness their unique abilities and unleash havoc upon your foes.




As you select both a character and a loyal pet for your expedition, the choices you make extend beyond mere aesthetics. Align yourself with a single clan out of three and double down on a single clan’s strengths, or pair two distinct clans for an edge in different types of encounters.




Meet a cast of eccentric characters lurking within the tower's shadows. From enigmatic elves to mischievous robots, every encounter adds a touch of unpredictability to your journey.




Ascend the tower, not just physically, but also in power. Unlock new orbs, uncover artifacts, and enhance your characters with a robust skill tree system to shape your personal playstyle and conquer the tower's mysteries.




With each ascent, the tower reshapes its halls and challenges. Adapt and strategize as you climb higher, facing new challenges at every floor.


  • 150+ Unique Orbs: Amass a collection of orbs, featuring both clan-exclusive and neutral choices.
  • Varied Partners: Randomized characters and pets, each with distinct traits, stats, and visuals.
  • Three Clans: Choose among three clans, and fuse primary and secondary clans to create varied character builds.
  • Empower Your Orbs: Choose from 20 enhancements to fortify your orbs, refining your gameplay approach.
  • Fight 30 Distinct Foes: Confront a roster of 30 distinct enemy types, each with unique behaviors and challenges.
  • Adapt with Enemy Resources: Seize enemies, their tools, and weapons to bolster your deck's strength and versatility.
  • Diverse Artifact Collection: Stumble upon 30 distinct artifacts, bestowing either empowering enhancements or daunting curses.
  • Dynamic Encounters: Experience random events, interact with shopkeepers, and engage in interactions between battles.

Are you ready to challenge the shadowy depths of Gamble Tower, where every step can be decided by the roll of a dice? The ultimate gambit awaits – for only the boldest gamblers will emerge victorious.
